My name is Nghiem Huynh /Nee-em Hwin/.

I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at Yale University and will be joining the Department of Economics at the University of Oklahoma as an Assistant Professor in July 2024.

My research focuses on Development Economics and International Trade.

See my research [here](papers.qmd) and find my CV [here](Huynh_Nghiem_CV.pdf){target="_blank"}.

Contact: [nghiem.huynh\@yale.edu]{.underline}
